oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interview with Aḥmad Sallūmmah
مقابلة مع أحمد سلومة
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633--Biography
Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633--Isrāʾ wa al-Miʻrāj
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Abū Ṭālib ʻAbd Manāf ibn ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib, approximately 540-approximately 619; Atheists; Āminah bint Wahb, -approximately 575; Biography of Prophet Muḥammad; Caves; Childbirth; Death; Gabriel (Archangel); Khadījah, -approximately 619; Marriage proposals; Morality; Orphans; Persecution; Priests; Prophecy; Shepherds; Solitude; Trade; Tribal customs; Worship; ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib, -570?; Abū Ṭālib ʻAbd Manāf ibn ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib, approximately 540-approximately 619; Atheists; Crimes against individuals; Faith; Immigration; Islam; Jesus Christ; Leaders; Martyrs; Mary, Blessed Virgin, Saint; Mischief; Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633; Negus, -630 or 631; Slaves; Torture; Adhān; Angels; Atheists; Believers; Blindness; Domestic violence; Gabriel (Archangel); Hunger; Islam; Mischief; Prayers; Prayers; Punishment; Qurʼān; Emotions; Ṣaḥābah; Secrecy; Sisters; Social classes; ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb, Caliph, -644; Ansar; Biography of Prophet Muḥammad; Songs; Ṭalaʻa al-badru ʻalaynā; ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb, Caliph, -644
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on January 21, 1996 with Aḥmad Sallūmmah, male, Born in 1961 from Suḥmātā, Palestine and resides in al-Baddāwī Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع أحمد سلومة في 21 كانون الثاني يناير عام 1996، ذكر، ولد عام 1961 من سحماتا، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم البداوي للاجئين الفلسطينين، لبنان.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Childhood life of Prophet Muḥammad and dawn of prophethood. (@ 0:00)
Beginning of islamic missionary and torture of muslim believers. (@ 29:49)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: بداية البعثات الإسلامية وتعذيب المؤمنين المسلمين. (@ 29:49)
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Islamic missionary and the miracle of al-Isrāʾ wa al-Miʻrāj . (@ 55:28)
Immigration of Prophet Muḥammad and muslims to Medina. (@ 84:43)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: هجرة النبي محمد والمسلمين إلى المدينة. (@ 84:43)
